page.title: 14LEISURE ACTIVITIES:CHILDREN.
page.content: In the 5_8 year age group,the most popular leisure activities are watching Television,playing with other children & reading,{mostly home based. Then follow swimming,dancing & riding lessons.Local Cub Scout & Brownie packs are popular too.Several children enjoy playing with computers. Unusual pets are goats & an Indian Python snake.The 9_12 year age group includes {more organised activities:}gymnastics, cricket,soccer, golf & orienteering, Scouts, Guides & Junior Church. Many children especially boys between 5 & 12,enjoy riding{BMX stunt bikes.}These have grown in popularity since about 1982.BMX stands for Bicycle Moto Cross.The bikes have wide tyres & padded handlebars.Special crash helmets,elbow & knee pads are often worn.Stunts include wheelies & endos & jumping over ramps.
